summary: This mod adds a Nord bandit follower named Ursula Eisernehand (Ironhand) into Skyrim. She was a user request and I was happy to oblige. She is available in a couple different looks and hair colors. She is also available as essential or non-essential. You will find her waiting for you at the Old Hroldan Inn. She uses the Shield, Dual Flurry and Bow!
